name: Jessica Crumby
text: I freaking love Blackjack pizza. The food is always good and they are very timely. I always order a couple spicy ranch and extra Greek dressing and when I have forgotten to add those to my order like usual they always throw it in knowing I …More

name: Shelly Finley
text: The best pizza. Salads are excellent. If you haven't tried them, give it a go. You won't be sorry!

name: Matthew Spaccarelli
text: The salad was great. Pizza was not the best but it was okay. I would eat there again.

name: André Orcutt
text: Great pizza. I wish I could give 5 stars, but every time I order something is wrong. I use the mobile app for points and then have to call in immediately after to make sure they get it right, but even then my order isn't correct when it arrives. Sigh.

name: Lori Gross
text: The best pizza in town! Nice folks - delivery or take out - either way you choose it's timely for getting the pizza. The pizza is always made to perfection!

name: S. Zander
text: This store messes up orders all the time!  Every time I give them another chance they blow it.  It’s a struggle to get an order right, the delivery is also VERY SLOW.  I like the pizza but...

name: Michael McNally
text: The value is fine and we do enjoy their pizza and salads. However for the delivery charge and then the five dollar plus tips I give, I would love for them to get my order right just one time. I swear they have a note in their computer so …More

name: E C
text: Great food and friendly service, still open for curbside and delivery.

name: Barbara Greene
text: The pizza is ok/good. BUT EVERY ORDER HAS SOMETHING WRONG.  wrong crust. Wrong toppings. Skimpy toppings. Flipping rediculous.

name: Jared Hickman
text: Really good value for the amount money you spend. The pizza was really good and the family deal they had going on was even better! They also offered gluten free pizza which was another bonus for my family. Definitely give Blackjack Pizza try besides the normal Domino's, Papa John's, Little Ceaser's, etc.

name: John Sala
text: Well it takes 90 minutes for your pizza to arrive and of course when you call they ask you to wait another 15 minutes just order somewhere else it will save you a growling gut!

name: Jennifer Evans
text: On two separate occasions we’ve called and they say over 2 hours for delivery! Crazy! The one other time we picked it up and it still took an hour, but the pizza was tasty. Needless to say the other two times we took our biz elsewhere. Oh and did I mention they had us on hold for fifteen minutes before they even tell us this info!

name: Ric Messier
text: Good pizza. Good delivery service. Good salads. Good cinnamon and sugar bread. Nice local business.

name: Laura G.
text: Horrible! Waited an hour n half, when supposed to be 45min. Pizza came old and Luke warm, crust hardened already. Inedible!!!!

name: Jalpesh Patadia
text: Great pizza,  wonderful service

name: Namiq Ahmadov
text: Love the service and quality. They always adjust it to vegan.

name: Renatta Banning
text: We ordered 2 pizzas and bone in buffalo wings and they came 1.5 hours after I called and we got boneless chicken nuggets rather than actual bone in buffalo wings.  I would rather drive out of our way to go get pizza somewhere else.

name: Theresa Garza
text: Delicious food and the client service at this spot is excellent. I was super full. Definitely worth a return trip!!

name: Justin Webb
text: Amazing food and the service was 5 stars. The menu was good and easy to understand. Recommended.

name: Tomas Remotigue
text: Pizza is pretty good for a chain and one of the better gluten free crusts. No non-dairy cheese though. Calzones are better than most sit down pizza places I've been to and an option the other major chains don't offer. Stick with take out or delivery though - it's not a sit-down style pizza parlor although they do have a couple of tables.

name: Sarah Davenport
text: We have been loyal customers to this location since we bought our house here 5 years ago. we have had a few messed up orders or delivery issues but nothing that wasn't fixed and handled. …More

name: Samuel Burkholder
text: I love Black Jack's Pizza and it's now my standard for pizza delivery. This company doesn't exist where I'm from.

name: Juan Arreola
text: Best blackjack in Colorado. Always fresh and customer service is top notch!

name: Loren Whitney
text: Our family started ordering Pizza here a few months ago and the pizza is pretty good. Delivery usually takes 30-45 minutes but it's consistent and reasonably priced. I can't give it 5 stars because it's not the best pizza ever.

name: Julia Harper
text: Very nice people, reasonably priced food. Very delicious.

name: Jeanne Clarke
text: Good pizza-really like the thin crust!  Friendly and fast.  I always try to spend my money at locally owned establishments.  Always get my money's worth.

name: Tanya Owens
text: We love their pan pizza with extra cheese! I only gave 4 stars because sometimes the staff changes and the delivery times are way off. I suggest doing carry out if you can.

name: M'chelle Lee
text: Best pizza around

name: Noah Van Ark
text: We really enjoy Black Jack Pizza. They had really friendly service and the pizza always tastes great and they have good prices too. I ordered a bunch of pizzas for my kids bday party in the morning via online ordering, requested for it to …More

name: Phillip Todd
text:
Always pretty good until this evening 9-16-2017.
Order a med. Pepperoni and sausage NY Thin and see my pic, this is how it came.

name: MAVERICK
text: I watched one of the workers vape onto my pizza as I was eating it. Another worker proceeded to undo his belt buckle while I was in there eating as well. Not sure if this is a pizza place or a brothel.

name: compark afw
text: Blackjack , always a great pie for not too much money. Pizza shouldn't cost you a lot of "dough" just to feed hungry kids and to watch the game. Always a good idea to support a local business. Go get some delicious pizza!

name: raelene Johnson
text: Great pizza fast service

name: Kristofor Webb
text: My daughter was just stiffed 2$ at the counter by a kid who couldn’t do math, or was just taking advantage of a young girl.  Management should keep an eye on this!

name: Meghan S
text: Fast. Great customer service.

name: Justin Heistermann
text: This location is one of the worst run establishments that I have ever seen.  I waited over 2 hours for a pizza and was never delivered.  So I called in after an hour and 15 minutes and was told the driver just left.  When I called again it …More

name: Jerrod Howard
text: Always have good service when we call in or pick up, get a delivery, etc. Pizza is a favorite in our house, and the prices can't be beat. It's nice to get a few large pizzas delivered for less than $50-60 as some of the neighboring establishments seem to want to charge.

name: Angela Dwinal
text: I would give zero stars if it was an option. Terrible customer service. I gave chance after chance to get better, but they obviously do not care about their customers. Stay away!

name: Cody Benson
text: Great food, fast, very friendly staff, new favorite

name: Joesph Woodson
text: Where's food place ever my food wasn't even cooked all the way and they messed up my order don't ever come here this place is terrible dont order from here

name: Cheryl Ann Bates
text: Best pizza around

name: Chia S
text: On two different occasions, I have found hairs in or on my pizza. Once was my son's birthday, the other a friend bought pizza for her daughter's party. Disgusting!

name: Ben Soelberg
text: Love it, the only pizza plave that delivers to my shop.

name: Noah Kriska
text: I like the flavor of the pizza and the staff I talked to has been fairly friendly.

name: Lindsey Terranova
text: Decent pizza, quick turnaround, mostly prompt or early delivery.

name: Kevin Cheek
text: Very nice people, reasonable pizza

name: Paul Aragon
text: They are always friendly and our pizzas have been good

name: Zachary Wieczorek
text: Really friendly service and really fast

name: Elijah Lagae
text: The prices are cheaper than the menu said!

name: Brook Stevens
text: This place is so dirty.

name: Jeremy Mansfield
text: Good

name: Hank Pantier
text: Quick, cheap delivery in Erie

name: Dawn Ferrera
text: Tired of crappy service!

name: Michael Diaz
text: Cheap and fast pizza

name: Michelle Osborn
text: We are New in town ordered the pizza terrible service talked to the owner Matt Ross we did not care about our concerns and hung up on us never will order at this place again

name: Isaiah Higgins
text: Great pizza, just messes up my order alot, but they always fix it.

name: Alfredo Macias
text: Great costumer service.
